title: Bakuman.
synopsis: As a child, Moritaka Mashiro dreamt of becoming a mangaka, just like his childhood hero and uncle, Tarou Kawaguchi, creator of a popular gag manga. But when tragedy strikes, he gives up on his dream and spends his middle school days studying, aiming to become a salaryman instead.
characters: ['Mashiro, Moritaka', 'Takagi, Akito', 'Niizuma, Eiji', 'Hiramaru, Kazuya', 'Azuki, Miho', 'Fukuda, Shinta', 'Hattori, Akira', 'Miyoshi, Kaya', 'Yoshida, Kouji', 'Aoki, Yuriko']
